toolbelt.jamlibconfig.displayToolBeltWhe: Show Tool Belt Hotbar when not Selected
toolbelt.advancements.tool_belt.title: NAME TBD
toolbelt.advancements.tool_belt.descript: Craft a tool belt to store your weapons and tools.
text.toolbelt.tutorial.description.1: The tool belt is a convenient way to store your weapons and tools. There are multiple ways to use it, explained in this short tutorial. You can check the controls menu for the current keybindings.
text.toolbelt.tutorial.description.2: The quick switch allows you to quickly switch between your weapons and tools. Press the key while holding shift to move an item into your tool belt, or press it without to just switch to your tool belt. There are both toggle and hold options.
text.toolbelt.tutorial.description.3: The tool belt GUI is a small window that can be opened with the relevant key. It is used like a normal inventory.
text.toolbelt.tutorial.description.4: The tool belt can be used like a bundle, meaning you can put items into it and take them out again by right clicking stacks onto the tool belt, or vica versa.
